questions.question: Choose the correct statement that describes Stroop Effect.

answers.a: Is a phenomenon in which the tendency to name a word will interfere with the ability to say the color in which the word is printed.
answers.b: Is a mental activity that consists of organizing information or beliefs into a series of steps in order to reach conclusions.
answers.c: Is a phenomenon in which the patient loses the ability to learn new things after a head injury.
answers.d: Is a phenomenon in which participants fail to detect the change in a scene when the change matches the context.
